text: Thanks for this Daniel! I appreciate your input

Hi <@U01F1AA9HD0>, thanks for posting about this here! Access to HTML and CSS is provided to professional and Enterprise Hubs - if your portal is subscribed to either of these two, you should see a directory under "Marketing > Files & Templates > Design Tools". That's where you can find your page's templates.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/get-started-with-the-design-manager|More info here! >
